effect.then: What you cannot eat for breakfast?
Dinner.
Why is there an expiration date on sour cream?
Hahaha.
Are there seeing eye humans for blind dogs?
I have no idea.
Why does the motorcycle rest on its stand?
Because it feels too tired.
Why does a hen always lay eggs?
If she dropped eggs, they would break.
If electricity comes from electrons, does morality come from morons?
Perhaps.
If practice makes perfect, and there is no such thing as perfect, why practice?
It's fun.
Do Lipton Tea employees take coffee breaks?
Perhaps.
Why is the third hand on the watch called the second hand?
Hahahaha.
Does a postman deliver his own mail?
Perhaps.
Why is the blackboard green?
Who knows.
What came first, the fruit or the color orange?
Who knows.
Does anyone actually kill two birds with one stone?
God knows.
Do the different M and M's colors taste different?
Yeah?
Why do we say "bye bye" but not "hi hi"?
Sounds fun.
Why do most cars have speedometers that go up to at least 130 when you legally can't go that fast on any road?
Just for fun.
Why do they report power outages on TV?
Sounds fun.
What can you catch but not throw?
A cold.
